Well, they now have your phone number and your summoner name even if it's not a virus.

There are two unique and distinct groups making these claims. The first group is people that play a lot, and have for a long time (probably) and no longer have anything to spend their ip on(own every champion, adequate number of eac rune, etc.). The second group has not been playing as long or as actively, and still needs to save their ip to buy the remaining champions.
And then there is the 3rd group that has so many smurfs they would have enough IP for everything, but have it spread out over way too many accounts

But that's ludicrous.

Given how Hextech crafting works now out of an average of 10 chests you'll mostly get 3 skin shards and the rest being 4 champ and the last three misc(wards, Icons). 

And that's just barely even a decent average, so unless these chest guarantee the materials we need this is just a huge money sink with little to no pay off for the lucky people the actually have success with such a delusional system. I'm also willing to bet that buying them with IP will cost more than the RP.

Mind you this is all in the name of just getting a BORDER! 

Also I noticed that we can only get 6 buy-able gemstones. figures we wouldn't be able to get the gems we need entirely unless we get a decent amount before hand IF you were that lucky before hand.
Have you tested the odds, i find the odds of getting and icon/ward more like 1/10 not 3/10

I've had no icons, and 1 ward in the about 30 chests I opened. I mostly get cheap skins. I have had 2 gemstones in those as well (Not that I own annie, or vayne). Odds are great and all but in the end everyone will experience things differently in a random system.
No part of getting the First Strike borders will be random. The Blueprints for each skin's border will come out of unique caches you can choose to pick up (for IP or RP!).
So If i purchase both project ekko and project katarina I can choose which skin to have the first strike border with ip?
Yes.

Let's say that I purchase an icon without buying the respective skin. If I happen to receive the skin after the end of the event through Hextech Crafting or any other mean, will I have the first strike border?

Also, do I have to equip the project icon as my summoner icon to get the first strike border on its respective skin?
I don't get it...

You guys really need to be more clear in the original post. It's not very clear what exactly the new components are and how they function. Like this paragraph "PROJECT Cores fuse with blueprints to unlock various types of loot. Certain blueprints allow you to craft First Strike icons for PROJECT: Ashe, PROJECT: Ekko, and PROJECT: Katarina, which you will need to secure First Strike borders for their loading screen cards." Isn't quite clear. Are these new items guaranteed from buying a PROJECT skin? from the caches? Do you get the first strike border automatically? Just the icons require RNG? This is a pretty murky announcement.

They should just put up links to the relevant surrenderat20 in place of their announcements at this point.  It would be worlds better.
